question:
In context of the recent state level visit from India to the Norfolk Naval Base, consider the following statements:
  1. It is the largest naval station in the world.
  2. It is onethe western coast of USA.
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: Statement 1 is correct: The Norfolk Naval Base is the largest naval base in the world. The Indian defence minister had visited the base and also another US base- Naval Air Station Oceana. The noted aircraft carrier USS Dwight D. Eisenhower was also featured in the visit to the Norfolk base. Statement 2 is incorrect: The Norfolk Naval Base is located on the eastern coast of US. It is in the state of Virginia. It houses the US Fleet Forces Command which operates in the Mediterranean Sea, Atlantic Ocean and the Indian Ocean. The base was built during the World War I.
